articles.title: Right Now, Managing AI Agents is About as Much Work as Managing Humans. Just Different Work.
articles.full_content: Here’s something almost nobody tells you when you deploy your first AI agent: you’re not eliminating management overhead. You’re trading one type of work for another. It’s different work. But it requires about as much time for oversight, review, and training as managing humans did. We’ve deployed 20+ AI agents at SaaStr over the past... Continue Reading

evaluation.rationale: 文章讨论了AI代理管理的复杂性，指出AI并没有消除管理开销，而是改变了管理的工作类型。这对AI产品的开发和运营具有直接的影响，尤其是在风险管理和信用决策方面。文章的可信度较高，来自SaaStr，一个知名的SaaS和投资领域媒体。
evaluation.key_takeaway: AI管理并非消除管理开销，而是改变了管理的工作类型。
